H0.text: Which town in East Sussex now stands on the site of the battle of Hastings. Hastings

H1.text: Which town in East Sussex now stands on the site of the battle of Hastings. Bexhill-on-Sea

H2.text: Which town in East Sussex now stands on the site of the battle of Hastings. Eastbourne

H3.text: Which town in East Sussex now stands on the site of the battle of Hastings. Battle

A4.text: close to the present-day town of Battle, East Sussex

A5.text: the battle took place 7 mi (11 km) north of Hastings at the present-day town of Battle
